data.name: tuinadvies/matelma smaller header - petit bandeau
data.description: For / pour: tuinadvies.be , tuinadvies.nl , matelma.com (be/fr/de) [EN] This stylesheet reduce the height of the page's header (which contains the shop's name and links). When you scroll, the header almost disappears. When you move the mouse over it, it pops again to its full size. Useful for a small screen. [FR] Cette feuille de style réduit la hauteur du bandeau de la page (qui contient le nom et le logo du site, ainsi que les liens importants). Quand vous faites défiler la page, le bandeau disparaît presque complètement. Il réapparaît quand vous déplacez la souris au dessus. Utile pour un écran de petite taille. [NL] Sorry my dutch is very very poor. [DE] I don't speak german, but the german version is restyled too. Another fix / autre correctif: cpu usage For more styles, userscripts, tips, ..., go here

data.name: neal.fun Dark
FPW
Yandex.Music FullHD Fix
Clean Dark WhatsApp Theme - Hopp
data.description:
-
-
-
NOTE!: WHATSAPP CHANGED THE HTML, I'LL BE WORKING ON UPDATING THIS THEME
-
-
-
A clean dark WhatsApp theme with a customizable theme color. (screenshot) In addition I also made a fullscreen addon to this theme. Liking this theme? You can support me by donating, or by leaving a comment. This theme (and other styles) is on my GitLab Thank you!

data.name: pgAdmin Dark Material Teal
data.description:
I couldn't stand looking at the blinding light anymore.
-- Note, I only spent enough time to ensure that I wasn't blinded. No effort was given to make this not look ugly.

I know it is ugly.

data.name: Meltan
data.description: Found this pic floating around after the release of Meltan so I decided to make a theme out of it. Apparently it's a Mythical Pokémon that can evolve into Melmetal...

data.name: Illusion
data.description: Created this theme as a request but still had to share it with the world. Especially for those of you who appreciate Zoroark. The amazing image was provided by All0412, check out the rest of his art @ https://all0412.deviantart.com/

data.name: Ho-Oh Revamped
data.description: After coming across this amazing image online (Artist Unknown?) it reminded me of an old PO Ho-Oh Theme that I found on the Serebii Forums years ago. So I decided to revamp it for PS, kind of a tribute to one of best Legendary Pokémon in the game...

data.name: Gengar
data.description: A very clean theme for Pokémon Showdown with an evil Gengar staring right at you. The theme is Dark Mode friendly so feel free to adjust that in the Settings menu. *Image provided by P4ndo, be sure to check out the rest of his art @ https://p4ndo.deviantart.com/

data.name: Elegant Victorian
data.description: A theme that I originally revamped for Pokémon Online (http://pokemon-online.eu/threads/28162/) but have ported over to Pokémon Showdown. *Very elegant*

data.name: Dragons Revamped
data.description: A tweaked / updated version of the Dragon Pokémon Showdown Skin theme created by Liance. *A lot of things have been improved upon by me as the original was released in 2015*
